General.Name: Importadora y Exportadora de la Patagonia SA
General.Description: Sociedad Anónima Importadora y Exportadora de la Patagonia operates a chain of supermarket in Argentina. Its supermarkets offer food, personal care, and children other products. The company was founded in 1908 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
